name: pomodoro-for-dev
description: Pomodoro is a Visual Studio Code extension that boosts productivity using the Pomodoro technique. It features a customizable clock in the status bar, helping you work in focused intervals with regular breaks. Enhance your coding sessions with Pomodoro.

pomodoro.pomodoroDuration.description: The duration of a Pomodoro work interval in minutes.

pomodoro.shortBreakDuration.description: The duration of a short break in minutes.

pomodoro.longBreakDuration.description: The duration of a long break in minutes (after 4 Pomodoros).

pomodoro.pomodoroClock.description: Show the countdown clock in the status bar.

pomodoro.confirmOnRestart.description: Show a confirmation dialog before restarting a session with a double-click.

pomodoro.autoPauseOnIdle.enabled.description: Enable to automatically pause the timer after a period of inactivity during a work session.

pomodoro.autoPauseOnIdle.timeout.description: The time in minutes of inactivity before the timer is auto-paused.

colors.description: Color used for Pomodoro break time text in status bar.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
